meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a boy.
meanings.sent1: The young puppy had a playful and boysy attitude.
meanings.sent2: The boysy laughter of the children filled the playground.
meanings.sent3: The boysy antics of the kitten chasing its tail made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her boysy enthusiasm for climbing trees was infectious.
meanings.sent5: The boysy grin on his face showed his excitement for the upcoming adventure.

meanings.definition: Energetic or lively in a boyish manner.
meanings.sent1: The boysy puppy ran around the yard with boundless energy.
meanings.sent2: His boysy enthusiasm for soccer practice was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The boysy way he jumped over puddles made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her boysy spirit lifted the mood of the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The boysy chatter of the group of friends echoed through the park.
